SKT_FIRST.name: Saikashuu Gunnery
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>的几率降低目标的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Barrier of Ryouran
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to increase the duration of debuffs on the enemy by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, then inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Resilience</color> on targets without debuffs for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で敵の弱体効果を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間増加させ、弱体効果がない対象の<color=#28d9ed>効果抵抗</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>의 확률로 적이 보유한 약화 효과의 지속 시간을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 증가시킨 후, 약화 효과가 없는 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 저항</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人。攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率使敌人附带的弱化效果持续时间增加<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>,使未附带弱化效果目标的<color=#28d9ed>效果抵抗</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: +1 turn reduced Critical Hit Chance on target

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes skill effect order\n(Debuff duration increase applies last)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 効果順番変更\n弱体効果の付与後\n持続ターン増加
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 약화 지속 증가 순서 교체\n(가장 마지막에 적용)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 变更弱化持续时间增加的顺序\n(将在最后生效)

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Juzumaru Tsunetsugu
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies, and has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nRight after using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to avoid triggering an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>強化不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与し、敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\nこのスキルでは<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応が発動しない。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>강화 불가</color>와 <color=#28d9ed>방어력 감소</color>를 부여합니다.\n이 스킬 직후에는 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color>의 확률로 적의 반격, 복수, 신속 대응이 발동하지 않습니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率对全体敌人造成<color=#28d9ed>无法强化</color>与<color=#28d9ed>防御力降低</color>效果,持续 <color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n此技能发动后,有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率不会触发敌人的反击、复仇、迅速应对效果。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks an enemy.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to decrease the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>をUPさせた後、敵単体にダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間、対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>をDOWNさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 증가시킨 후 적을 공격합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:使我方全体的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>,随后攻击敌人。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的概率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
